content.raw:
zbeacon solves the problem of sending and receiving data using UDP broadcast. For example, you can configure a beacon that sends every second your node's information. You can also use zbeacon for receive information about other nodes. However, zbeacon does not include a discovery protocol per se, you can use it for sending/receiving any data you want. 

[ZRE][http://rfc.zeromq.org/spec:20] might be an alternative to our own discovery protocol but I don't think there's an implementation ready to use. So, we could implement ZRE or keep our discovery protocol if it's simpler.
